snippet: The gangs terrorized the Wagner Houses complex by openly selling crack cocaine and marijuana, the Manhattan district attorney said.
abstract: Authorities report that two gangs that terrorized residents of Harlem's Robert F Wagner Houses for years by openly selling crack cocaine and marijuana were brought down with the arrest of 19 members; arrests are part of a focused effort by the Manhattan district attorney's office to eliminate violent drug and gun gangs.
lead_paragraph: The gangs terrorized the Wagner Houses complex by openly selling crack cocaine and marijuana, the Manhattan district attorney said.

headline.seo: Drug Gangs Terrorizing Harlem Housing Project Are Broken, Officials Say
headline.main: 2 Harlem Gangs Broken by Arrests, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: 2 Harlem Gangs Broken By Arrests, Officials Say
